mainHero.title: Whichmealservice
mainHero.description: There are many meal kits available on the market, from ready-to-eat meals to recipe boxes
mainHero.descriptionHowItWorks: Our website enables you to compare meal kit subscription services available in the UK. Whether you're looking for the cheapest, healthiest, most sustainable or gluten-free option.

primaryAction.text: Click here to compare meal kits

items.title: Customer User Journey
items.descriptionOne: Preparing home-cooked food for the week can take a long time and might be the last thing you want to do when you come home from work. “We're having pasta bolognese, again?” - we've all been there...
items.descriptionTwo: There are talented chefs in your community who are keen to share their amazing home-cooked meals with you, help you prepare food for the week to come, and enable you to experience new cuisines all at the same time.

steps.alt: Step One: Register for an account
Step Two: Pick a cuisine you want to try
Step Five: Wait for your meals to be delivered!

features.title: About Us
features.description: We’re two friends who met at King's College London and are passionate about food and personal finance. Our mission is to help people make informed purchase decisions.

items.name: Tereza Rusova
items.description: I am passionate about food, connecting people and celebrating diversity. I want to enable people to eat well, especially in the midst of a cost of living crisis.

items.name: Atheer Musa
items.description: I’m a software engineer. I’m passionate about building products that empower people and enrich their lives.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
